Accordion.val: The accordion directive builds on top of the collapse directive to provide a list of items

Alert.val: This directive can be used both to generate alerts from static and dynamic model data

Buttons.val: With the buttons directive, we can make a group of buttons behave like a set of checkboxes

Carousel.val: Carousel creates a carousel similar to bootstrap's image carousel.

Collapse.val: uib-collapse provides a simple way to hide and show an element with a css transition

Dateparser.val: The uibDateParser is what the uib-datepicker uses internally to parse the dates. You can use it standalone by injecting the uibDateParser service where you need it.

Datepicker.val: It comes in two formats, an inline uib-datepicker and an uib-datepicker-popup to be embedded in an input.

Dropdown.val: Dropdown is a simple directive which will toggle a dropdown menu on click or programmatically.

Modal.val: $uibModal is a service to create modal windows. Creating modals is straightforward: create a template, a controller and reference them when using $uibModal.

Pager.val: A lightweight pager directive that is focused on providing previous/next paging functionality

Pagination.val: A lightweight pagination directive that is focused on ... providing pagination & will take care of visualising a pagination bar and enable / disable buttons correctly!

Popover.val: A lightweight, extensible directive for fancy popover creation. The popover directive supports multiple placements, optional transition animation, and more.

position.val: The $uibPosition service provides a set of DOM utilities used internally to absolute-position an element in relation to another element

Progressbar.val: A progress bar directive that is focused on providing feedback on the progress of a workflow or action.

Rating.val: A progress bar directive that is focused on providing feedback on the progress of a workflow or action.

Tabs.val: AngularJS version of the tabs directive.

Tooltip.val: A lightweight, extensible directive for fancy tooltip creation. The tooltip directive supports multiple placements, optional transition animation, and more.

Typeahead.val: Typeahead is a AngularJS version of Bootstrap v2's typeahead plugin. This directive can be used to quickly create elegant typeaheads with any form text input.
